column2: an A.M. Eatery////We ordered the Benny Duo
column4: I have seen them offer two selections
column5: because I have been torn many times in the past.  Chilaquiles Benedict and the Chile Verde Benny.  In all honesty
column6: I screwed up.  I didn't read past the first sentence
column7: so didn't realize both of these were going to be served on tortillas instead of english muffins.  Now I have to come back to try their other bases.  However
column8: their twist was excellent.  Just by doing the duo
column9: I was going to get to try 2 different samplings
column10: but in the end I had two similar experiences
